alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 04 at 10:41AM EST until January 05 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... The Kentucky River near Ravenna, affecting Estill County. ...A FLOOD ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...High water levels caused by excessive rainfall are occurring. * WHERE...The advisory is for the Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...The advisory lasts from this morning until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, low lying areas flood. Red Lick Road, Millers Creek Road, Dark Hollow Road, and Noland Creek Road flood in several places. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 13.4 feet by Sunday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued 10 PM.
